sentences.sContent: Rather than judging the disciples too harshly, we would do well to examine the reason for their slumbers.
sentences.sContent_eng: Rather than judging the disciples too harshly, we would do well to examine the reason for their slumbers.
sentences.sCn: 我们不应过于严厉地论断这些门徒们，但是可以好好地探究一下他们睡着的原因。
